turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I'm kind of hot today cuz it's so warm out. Can can you help me order some coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me an iced caffe Americano, just black no milk, grande, and I want simple syrup, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a grande iced americano with simple syrup, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm it's a grande? I'm sorry. I I can't remember.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, you requested a grande iced americano with simple syrup

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. All right, then we're all good.
